tool.name: Build IGoR model
tool.description: using IGoR commandline interface that is VDJ or VJ compliant.
tool.command:
immuno-probs
## general immuno-probs parameters -separator '$optional.separator' -threads \$GALAXY_SLOTS
## tool command build-igor-model
## sequence input -seqs '$input.sequences'
## model type -type '$input.cond_type.type'
## reference genomic templates -ref 'V' '$input.cond_type.ref_v' -ref 'J' '$input.cond_type.ref_j' #if $input.cond_type.type == "beta" or $input.cond_type.type == "heavy": -ref 'D' '$input.cond_type.ref_d' #end if
## number of training iterations -n-iter $input.iterations

param.name: separator
param.label: In/out file separator character
param.help: The separator character to be used when writing files.

param.name: ref_v
param.label: Reference genomic template - V gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.name: ref_j
param.label: Reference genomic template - J gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.name: ref_v
param.label: Reference genomic template - V gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.name: ref_d
param.label: Reference genomic template - D gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.name: ref_j
param.label: Reference genomic template - J gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.name: ref_v
param.label: Reference genomic template - V gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.name: ref_v
param.label: Reference genomic template - V gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.name: ref_d
param.label: Reference genomic template - D gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.name: ref_j
param.label: Reference genomic template - J gene
param.help: Needs to conform to IGMT annotation.

param.name: sequences
param.label: Training sequences
param.help: CSV files need to conform to IGoR standards, 'seq_index' and 'nt_sequence' column.

param.name: iterations
param.label: Number of training rounds
param.help: The number of inference iterations to perform when creating the model.

tool.help:
**ImmunoProbs**
Create IGoR models and calculate the generation probability of V(D)J and CDR3 sequences.
For documentation have a look at the ImmunoProbs wiki "https://github.com/penuts7644/ImmunoProbs/wiki".
